step_feedback.feedback: Good job on the first step! You performed the shoulder blade squeeze and circular motion well. Remember to breathe deeply as you pull your shoulders back.
In step 2, focus on maintaining a smoother, more controlled circular motion.  Try to keep your elbows relaxed and avoid unnecessary wrist movement.
Step 3 shows some inconsistency.  Concentrate on keeping the movement controlled and consistent throughout the four repetitions.  Avoid jerky movements.

exercise_summary: You did a good job with the shoulder rolls exercise!  Remember to keep your movements smooth and controlled, focusing on squeezing your shoulder blades together and breathing deeply.  Practice maintaining this form for better results.
